title:BRAVE arsenal
description:This is my own compiled list of god rolls for the BRAVE arsenal weapons released in "Into the Light".

// Edge Transit (BRAVE weapon arsenal)
//notes: julian (PVE) Velocity/Handling Masterwork
dimwishlist:item=568611923&perks=981914802,3301904089,968510818,3078487919,2489430594
